Management Team

Wahab Ali

Technical Head

Wahab Ali is an experienced professional with a diverse background in the renewable energy sector. Currently serving as the Technical Head at Burj Capital, he plays a pivotal role in overseeing the installation and design of photovoltaic (PV) projects, ensuring customer satisfaction while maintaining cost-effectiveness. Prior to this, he worked as a Project Manager at Burj Capital and as a Technical Manager at ACT Engineering Services Pvt Ltd., where responsibilities included planning and supervising maintenance activities, coordinating with Trina Solar, and sales of solar panels. With previous roles as Deputy Technical Manager and O&M Engineer, he brings a wealth of experience in managing solar PV projects and maintaining customer satisfaction. Additionally, he has a background in project engineering, research, and development of solar products, making him a valuable addition to the Board of Directors. Mr. Wahab holds a Bachelors in Engineering with a focus on Energy Engineering from Hamdard University.

Pakistan's first Shariah-compliant green energy fund, investing in renewable energy for a sustainable future.
